result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Romeo J Gardner

records.addlTxt: At the request of the defense, case is scheduled for a bail review on 11-9-22 at 1:30 pm. Parties notified of court date via email.
Justice Point Violation Report forwarded to Judge for review and filed.

Defendant Romeo J Gardner in court.  Attorney Michael J Cerniglia in court for Romeo J Gardner.  Prosecuting attorney Michelle A. Grasso in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a plea and sentencing. Defense is requesting final pretrial and jury trial dates. Case is adjourned to 12-5-22 at 8:30 am for final pretrial and 1-17-2023 for jury trial.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 17, 2023 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Supervision Report, filed.
filed.
filed.
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Romeo J. Gardner - E2/41, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Speedy Trial.  (Romeo J. Gardner - E2/41, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Attorney Michael J Cerniglia in court, defendant Romeo J Gardner not in court, in custody.  Claire E Zyber appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
Defense is requesting a plea and sentencing hearing date.  Case is adjourned to 9-23-22 at 10:30 am for plea and sentencing in person in Room 504 of the Courthouse.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 11:03 am.
Defendant's Motion to Dismiss (Romeo Gardner #2022004773 - HOC 8885 S. 68TH ST. FRANKLIN, WI. 53132)
Letter from Defendant (Romeo Gardner #2022004773 - HOC 8885 S. 68TH ST. FRANKLIN, WI. 53132)

Attorney Michael J Cerniglia in court, defendant Romeo J Gardner not in court, in custody.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means for .  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Scheduling Conference held.  Defense counsel has discovery and requests additional status conference date to review with defendant.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Kiefer.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Havas, Br. 10.

CASE HEARD IN PRELIM FOR BR. 29:
Defendant Romeo J Gardner in court with Attorney Michael J Cerniglia; both appear by video.  Defendant Romeo J Gardner in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 10, Judge Havas. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 10.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Motion for Production of Discovery.  (Romeo J. Gardner - #2022004773, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Romeo J Gardner not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

.Court ordered no contact with J.L
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5. ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers. If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, bail to revert to $10,000 . If alternative bail is paid, Defendant to be released and placed on Electronic Monitoring waiting list. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Romeo J Gardner in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent. Defendant Romeo J Gardner in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Romeo J Gardner appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 2. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer Branch 29.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.   Court advised defendant that due to nature of offense in Count 1 a sample of your DNA is required.  If the sheriff's department hasn't already obtained a sample I order them to do so. There are circumstances that you can request the sample to be expunged from the data base pursuant to statute 165.77(4). DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL. Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.

This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Prior: 5106 Taylor Avenue, Racine, WI 53403
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
